summary: Why would someone that knows so well the benefits of heavy armor not wear it?
descriptionHtml:
Way back when, I posted [url=https://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/4898545-brunwulf-free-winter-should-wear-heavy-armor/#entry42800985]this thread[/url], and with an incredibly helpful reply, it became possible for even the simplest mind to create and share this incredibly simple mod.

What it does:  Replaces Brunwulf Free-Winter's light armor boots with steel, and adds steel gauntlets.

My game is Merged, Bashed, & Patched, but it doesn't want to load before Immersive Citizens - if his armor doesn't change, or he's in his undies, check your load order.

If you have any issues with the mod, I'll try & see what I can do, but I'd seriously recommend you make a friend that knows how to mod.

[b]ALWAYS [/b]back-up your saves.

Not intended for sale, and always free for all.
author: KnockKnock
